title: kingplaya4
author: kingplaya4
content: WENT TO BED WITH OVER A TENTH OF A BITCOIN. WOKE UP WITH NOTHING BUT PENNIES IN RAKEBACK. THEY ARE GOING TO CLAIM I LOST EVERYTHING PLAYING HIGH STAKES HOLD'EM. ONLY ONE PROBLEM. I TOOK A PORTION OF MY WINNINGS TO PLAY THAT AND THEN QUIT WHEN LOST. I WAS STONE COLD SOBER, I REMEMBER MY WINNINGS WHEN LOGGING OUT.PLAY ON THIS SCAME SITE THAT IS FULL OF BOTS AND REGULARS AND ENCOURAGES PROS AND DOES NO PROMOTIONS FOR RECS AT YOUR OWN RISK!!THE ONLY REASON TO PLAY HERE IS TO GET SCAMMED AND TO PLAY AGAINST TOUGH OPPOSITION YOU MOSTLY WOULDN'T SEE IN A CASINO.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: If you want to create a scam accusation thread against this casino then do it properly, I have added the format in how to report scams the proper way so make sure you follow it and add as much evidence as you can get to back you up. Because all I can see in your thread are just words and for all that we know you could be lying about everything you have written so to clear that doubt just edit your post and if you can get screenshots or videos to help your case then add it to it.Code:[b][color=black]What happened:: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Scammers Profile Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Reference Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Amount Scammed: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Payment Method: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Proof of Payment: [/color][/b][b][color=black]PM/Chat Logs: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Additional Notes: [/color][/b]And also donâ€™t forget to move this thread to scam accusation board.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: If you would like for your scam accusation to be taken seriously, you will have to provide evidence. Do you have any screenshots of before and after balances showing the drop from +0.1 BTC to sats? I do not know what their Terms and Conditions state and I will not look in to it until you post here with some form of evidence first.I think your negative tag does not look good therefore it is difficult to take you seriously. Can you at least post a screenshot from your Account area?Quote from: kingplaya4 on November 03, 2023, 02:47:39 PMWENT TO BED WITH OVER A TENTH OF A BITCOIN. WOKE UP WITH NOTHING BUT PENNIES IN RAKEBACK. THEY ARE GOING TO CLAIM I LOST EVERYTHING PLAYING HIGH STAKES HOLD'EM. ONLY ONE PROBLEM. I TOOK A PORTION OF MY WINNINGS TO PLAY THAT AND THEN QUIT WHEN LOST. I WAS STONE COLD SOBER, I REMEMBER MY WINNINGS WHEN LOGGING OUT.PLAY ON THIS SCAME SITE THAT IS FULL OF BOTS AND REGULARS AND ENCOURAGES PROS AND DOES NO PROMOTIONS FOR RECS AT YOUR OWN RISK!!THE ONLY REASON TO PLAY HERE IS TO GET SCAMMED AND TO PLAY AGAINST TOUGH OPPOSITION YOU MOSTLY WOULDN'T SEE IN A CASINO.

comments.author: kingplaya4
comments.body: Are you guys shills for them? Of course I didn't take screenshots, I trusted them. What on earth would I possibly have to gain from this? They have made it clear they are not returning anything to me, and what little I had left I transferred to a random player. Don't wish to play on a scam site anymore. There are tons of sites out there, why play here.And even if you believe I didn't lose or just lost by poor play, the site is full of bots and regs and it terrible to recs and people that don't live on a computer waiting for a fish to come by (of wish there are so few of most must be associated with the site). The only reason I played there is my country outlaws nearly all sites except them for whatever reason. "It isn't a scam post". I'm not looking for anything from you guys. Kindly change that...

Kindly change that...At the very least you can post screenshots with the support conversation where they say they won't return your funds and why. How else is the community here going to form an opinion?

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Strange story.Can you look at the hand history?If somebody lost it on purpose there must be evidence of chip dumping to be found in the history.It's so eays to check for yourself.Also, the support should check the login IPs, that's the easiest way to find out if there is foul play.Show us the history of you like, I am curious to see it for myself. It should tell a story you can move forward with. I am also a long time SWC member, sly seal level.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on November 05, 2023, 09:18:22 AMStrange story.Can you look at the hand history?If somebody lost it on purpose there must be evidence of chip dumping to be found in the history.It's so eays to check for yourself.Also, the support should check the login IPs, that's the easiest way to find out if there is foul play.Show us the history of you like, I am curious to see it for myself. It should tell a story you can move forward with. I am also a long time SWC member, sly seal level.As you're an user of the platform and quite familiar with their interface, does the history also reveal recent winnings with the amount won? If so, OP, can you provide this screenshot? Since you don't have a screenshot of your balance when it's 0.1 BTC, I assume we can prove your balance was around that through the past winnings?

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on November 05, 2023, 10:02:28 AMQuote from: AHOYBRAUSE on November 05, 2023, 09:18:22 AMStrange story.Can you look at the hand history?If somebody lost it on purpose there must be evidence of chip dumping to be found in the history.It's so eays to check for yourself.Also, the support should check the login IPs, that's the easiest way to find out if there is foul play.Show us the history of you like, I am curious to see it for myself. It should tell a story you can move forward with. I am also a long time SWC member, sly seal level.As you're an user of the platform and quite familiar with their interface, does the history also reveal recent winnings with the amount won? If so, OP, can you provide this screenshot? Since you don't have a screenshot of your balance when it's 0.1 BTC, I assume we can prove your balance was around that through the past winnings?The software shows you replays of all your cash game hands actually. So if you want to see screenshots that must and can only be taken hand by hand. There is no overall win/loss ratio statistics that one can check and see.I mean collusion/chip dumping can easily be spotted of you observe every hand. Also every hand has a number so it can be checked by support if they for example raise, reraise, fold all the time to move the balance to a different account without actually a showdown.The "thief" could also just have withdrawn all the money since the account doesn't seem to be 2fa protected. But since withdrawals at SWC sometimes take a while chip dumping seems to be the "easier" way this could have happened.

I am also a long time SWC member, sly seal level.now I am also curious about OP's game history.as for checking the IP logins, I messaged SWC forum representatives informing them of this thread, perhaps it is possible to ask them here to check OP's account IP log-ins.also, @OP would you mind sharing your game history?

I'm not looking for anything from you guys. Kindly change that...If you do not want anything then what's the point of posting it here without proof?

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: OP to be serious with you, this is just like making a story line without anything to show that it's a real life experience, you're not giving enough information that can help you and you're not also giving the evidence for anything, the whole talk you made is not in order as well, you should know that when you're taking a platform in consideration, you should make adequate research before using them and at your own risk.

Kindly change that...What does this even mean?Quote from: robelneo on November 07, 2023, 09:29:40 PMIf you do not want anything then what's the point of posting it here without proof?That is a question he will not answer but maybe he is attention-seeking.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: kingplaya4 on November 03, 2023, 02:47:39 PM...PLAY ON THIS SCAME SITE THAT IS FULL OF BOTS AND REGULARS AND ENCOURAGES PROS AND DOES NO PROMOTIONS FOR RECS AT YOUR OWN RISK!!...Nonsense conspiracy theory from someone who has no fucking idea how poker rooms make profit. Although the regulars bring traffic, the rooms have been disadvantaging them for many years, giving them less rakeback and less promotions because they are net winners who end up withdrawing money from the money deposited in the room. The recreational players, on the other hand, are the ones who make the business work. So the theory that the room favors pros and regulars against recreational players is simply not true.

Kindly change that...While anyone is allowed to have an opinion, you should at least provide proof of your claims if you're going to defame a site. If you just wanted to make a post trying to hurt a reputation, you could at least lock the thread once your done spewing your nonsense.Since OP is not coming back to answer all the valid questions I think it's fair to assume he finally remembered what happened with his funds.Â  I never heard of money disappearing at SWC, yet I would never trust that site with higher amounts.There are some sketchy things going on as swc, I have to admit that. Collusion between accounts controlled by the same person happenes frequently and the support does nothing. Me and some other players have encountered these scammers several times and nothing happened after a report.Then there are these sketchy accounts that NEVER lose, variance is not happening for them. Also, people working for swc are playing at the site as well, which is not a good look in my opinion. Needless to say they have no license and if and how the card distribution is fair is also nowhere to be found. We people ask that question they get banned or the message deleted from the telegram channel.But hey, we can all decide if we play there or not. Since so much questionable stuff happened there I stopped playing, just to be safe.
